pli-tv-kd6:40.1.1.pli: Tena kho pana samayena bhikkhūnaṃ kismiñci kismiñci ṭhāne kukkuccaṃ uppajjati—
pli-tv-kd6:40.1.1.eng: At that time the monks were anxious about all sorts of matters, thinking,

pli-tv-kd6:40.1.2.pli: “kiṃ nu kho bhagavatā anuññātaṃ, kiṃ ananuññātan”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:40.1.2.eng: “What has the Buddha allowed and what hasn’t he allowed?”

pli-tv-kd6:40.1.4.pli: “Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ tañce akappiyaṃ anulometi, kappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.1.4.eng: “If I haven’t specifically prohibited something, then it’s unallowable to you if it’s similar to what’s unallowable and opposed to what’s allowable.

pli-tv-kd6:40.1.5.pli: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ na kappatī’ti appaṭikkhittaṃ tañce kappiyaṃ anulometi, akappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.1.5.eng: If I haven’t specifically prohibited something, then it’s allowable to you if it’s similar to what’s allowable and opposed to what’s unallowable.

pli-tv-kd6:40.1.6.pli: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ kappatī’ti ananuññātaṃ tañce akappiyaṃ anulometi, kappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.1.6.eng: If I haven’t specifically allowed something, then it’s unallowable to you if it’s similar to what’s unallowable and opposed to what’s allowable.

pli-tv-kd6:40.1.7.pli: Yaṃ, bhikkhave, mayā ‘idaṃ kappatī’ti ananuññātaṃ, tañce kappiyaṃ anulometi, akappiyaṃ paṭibāhati, taṃ vo kappatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:40.1.7.eng: If I haven’t specifically allowed something, then it’s allowable to you if it’s similar to what’s allowable and opposed to what’s unallowable.”

pli-tv-kd6:40.2.2.pli: “kappati nu kho yāvakālikena yāmakālikaṃ, na nu kho kappati?
pli-tv-kd6:40.2.2.eng: “Are post-midday tonics mixed with ordinary food allowable or unallowable?

pli-tv-kd6:40.2.3.pli: Kappati nu kho yāvakālikena sattāhakālikaṃ, na nu kho kappati?
pli-tv-kd6:40.2.3.eng: Are seven-day tonics mixed with ordinary food allowable or unallowable?

pli-tv-kd6:40.2.4.pli: Kappati nu kho yāvakālikena yāvajīvikaṃ, na nu kho kappati?
pli-tv-kd6:40.2.4.eng: Are lifetime tonics mixed with ordinary food allowable or unallowable?

pli-tv-kd6:40.2.5.pli: Kappati nu kho yāmakālikena sattāhakālikaṃ, na nu kho kappati?
pli-tv-kd6:40.2.5.eng: Are seven-day tonics mixed with post-midday tonics allowable or unallowable?

pli-tv-kd6:40.2.6.pli: Kappati nu kho yāmakālikena yāvajīvikaṃ, na nu kho kappati?
pli-tv-kd6:40.2.6.eng: Are lifetime tonics mixed with post-midday tonics allowable or unallowable?

pli-tv-kd6:40.2.7.pli: Kappati nu kho sattāhakālikena yāvajīvikaṃ, na nu kho kappatī”ti?
pli-tv-kd6:40.2.7.eng: Are lifetime tonics mixed with seven-day tonics allowable or unallowable?”

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.1.pli: “Yāvakālikena, bhikkhave, yāmakālikaṃ, tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ kāle kappati, vikāle na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.1.eng: “When mixed with ordinary food, post-midday tonics are allowable before midday on the day they are received, but not after midday.

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.2.pli: Yāvakālikena, bhikkhave, sattāhakālikaṃ, tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ kāle kappati, vikāle na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.2.eng: When mixed with ordinary food, seven-day tonics are allowable before midday on the day they are received, but not after midday.

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.3.pli: Yāvakālikena, bhikkhave, yāvajīvikaṃ, tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ kāle kappati, vikāle na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.3.eng: When mixed with ordinary food, lifetime tonics are allowable before midday on the day they are received, but not after midday.

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.4.pli: Yāmakālikena, bhikkhave, sattāhakālikaṃ, tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ yāme kappati, yāmātikkante na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.4.eng: When mixed with post-midday tonics, seven-day tonics are allowable after midday on the day they are received, but not beyond dawn.
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.4.comm: The point here is that the day ends at dawn. The mixture has the same allowable period as post-midday tonics do on their own.

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.5.pli: Yāmakālikena, bhikkhave, yāvajīvikaṃ, tadahu paṭiggahitaṃ yāme kappati, yāmātikkante na kappati.
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.5.eng: When mixed with post-midday tonics, lifetime tonics are allowable after midday on the day they are received, but not beyond dawn.

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.6.pli: Sattāhakālikena, bhikkhave, yāvajīvikaṃ paṭiggahitaṃ, sattāhaṃ kappati, sattāhātikkante na kappatī”ti.
pli-tv-kd6:40.3.6.eng: When mixed with seven-day tonics, lifetime tonics are allowable for seven days, but not beyond.”

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.7.eng: The sixth chapter on medicines is finished.

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.10.eng: Fat, about root, and with flours;

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.21.eng: In a concoction of oil, and alcohol,

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.36.eng: Clear congee, mung-bean broth, oily mung-bean broth.

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.41.eng: He allowed again, when short of food,

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.58.eng: Product of a cow, and with provisions;

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.59.eng: Keṇi, mango, rose apple, bananas with seeds,

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.60.eng: Seedless bananas, licorice, grapes, lotus tubers.

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.64.eng: And about all sorts of matters, in the time period.”

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.65.eng: In this chapter there are one hundred and six topics.

pli-tv-kd6:40.3.66.eng: The chapter on medicines is finished.
